sentences.en: A ceasefire is an essential precondition for negotiation.
sentences.cn: 停火是谈判的必要前提。

sentences.en: After 10 years of negotiation, the Senate ratified the strategic arms reduction treaty.
sentences.cn: 经过10年协商，参议院已经正式批准了《削减战略武器条约》。

sentences.en: After negotiation, they tacked two new clauses on to the end of the contract.
sentences.cn: 通过协商, 他们在合同末尾处又加上了两项新条款.

sentences.en: Four years of negotiation ended fruitlessly last December.
sentences.cn: 历时4年的谈判在去年12月无果而终。

sentences.en: The negotiation broke down because one side refused to play the game.
sentences.cn: 因一方拒绝按章办事,谈判破裂了.

sentences.en: The negotiation dragged on until July.
The negotiation will begin on schedule.
The trader was obstinate in the negotiation.
sentences.cn: 这个商人在谈判中拗强固执.

sentences.en: The way forward in this situation is by diplomacy and negotiation.
sentences.cn: 在这种情況下要取得进展需要讲究点手腕和商谈.

sentences.en: There will be a strong incentive to enter into a process of negotiation.
sentences.cn: 将会出现迫切地想要进入谈判阶段的强烈动机。

sentences.en: These proposals represent a realistic starting point for negotiation.
sentences.cn: 这些建议是谈判的现实出发点。

sentences.en: They agreed to try to settle their dispute by negotiation.
sentences.cn: 他们同意通过谈判来努力解决纠纷。

sentences.en: They closed the deal in sugar after a week of negotiation.
sentences.cn: 经过一星期的谈判,他们的食糖生意成交了.

sentences.en: Warren said, "We have had meaningful negotiations and I believe we are very close to a deal."
sentences.cn: 沃伦说：“我们已经进行了富有意义的谈判，我相信我们很快就能达成协议。”

sentences.en: We advocate solving international dispute by negotiation, instead of appealing to arms.
sentences.cn: 我们主张通过协商解决国际争端, 而不主张诉诸武力.

sentences.en: We consummated an agreement after a year of negotiation.
sentences.cn: 经过一年的谈判,我们达成了协议.

trans.tran_en: official discussions between the repre­sentatives of opposing groups who are trying to reach an agreement, especially in business or politics
